property.description: Possible values are 'wiki','space' or 'page', where: 'page': only events which are children pages of this page will be included, 'space': only events which are in the space of the calendar doc will be included, 'wiki': all events will be included.
The calendar document whose events are shown (only if filter is set to 'page'). This value is also used as the default calendar to create new events for. If missing, the current document is used.
The initial way the calendar is displayed; can be changed by the user. Possible values are: 'month', 'agendaWeek', 'agendaDay' or 'plainList'
First day (from 0 being Sunday to 6 being Monday) of the week to show in the calendar. Leave empty for Monday
First time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours before this time. Leave empty for default (8:00)
Last time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours after this time. Leave empty for default (23:00)
Year of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today
Month (from 0 to 11) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today
Day (from 1 to 31) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today
Sets a limit on daily event display. Extra events appear in a popover. If false (default) shows all events, else (true) restricts them to the day cells height.
